item.title: Climate Downscaling
item.description: Hybrid statistical-dynamic downscaling based on multi-model ensembles What we are releasing We are releasing a bias-corrected and downscaled dataset based on 14 Coupled Model Intercomparison Project 6 (CMIP6) global climate models (GCMs) and the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts Reanalysis 5 (ERA5) dataset.
